SamsonSafaris.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$20.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees Some meals (As specified in the day-by-day section)
SamsonSafaris.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          Book your own international flights when using this operator help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
